title: Opening Dua For Salah Dua Al Istiftah Mandatory?
transcript: [Music] taraweeh is it to be recited in a starting of every two raka's or only once in the beginning the inaugural dua supplication is a highly recommended sunnah and it's not only subhanallah we can also say that you can there's so many variants of it alhamdulillah but it is not mandatory so in taraweeh or even in far prayer or normal sunnah prayer if you say it you reward it if not there is nothing wrong and your prayer is still valid
